augmentation_techniques.quote: It uses a lot of augmentation, including randomcrop, H/V flip, a large number of RGB transform, cutout, grid distortion, etc... simply aug + snapmix, and gradually increase the probability of snapmix by epoch

base_models.quote: efficientnet_b4_ns... seresnext101... seresnext50... VIT_base16... regnety120... resnext101... resnest101

primary_loss.quote: loss: bi-tempered... loss: focalcos... loss: CE

regularization.quote: based on the prediction results of the first scheme, knowledge distillation is carried out, and the student model results and the teacher model results are weighted by a ratio of 4:6

ensemble_method.quote: 6modelx4TTA... 3model and 5xrandomTTA... 5model and 5xTTA... the student model results and the teacher model results are weighted by a ratio of 4:6

prediction_averaging.quote: 6modelx4TTA... 3model and 5xrandomTTA... 5model and 5xTTA... randomTTA is the same as the augmentation method in training, randomly 5 times

image_size.quote: efficientnet_b4_ns bi-tempered 512... seresnext101 bi-tempered 512... VIT_base16 focalcos 384... VIT_base16 bi-tempered 384... regnety120 focalcos 512
